message.content:
Subject: Resignation from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inform you of my decision to resign from my position at [Company Name]. My last day will be [last day].

Throughout my time here, I have learned and grown both professionally and personally. I am grateful for the opportunities and experiences I've had while working with such a talented team. I want to express my sincere appreciation for your support and guidance during my tenure at [Company Name]. It has been an honor to work alongside you in achieving our goals.

In order to ensure a smooth transition, I would like to offer my assistance in helping to find and train my replacement. Please let me know how I can best support the team during this time. Additionally, if there are any outstanding tasks or projects that need to be completed before my departure, please do not hesitate to assign them to me.

I will make sure to tie up any loose ends and finish any ongoing work by [date]. After that, I'll provide a detailed handover document outlining all the relevant information for my role.

Please let me know if there is anything else you need from me during this process. Once again, thank you for your understanding and support throughout my time at [Company Name]. I wish the company continued success in the future.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Your Email Address]
[Your Phone Number]
